english.segment1: Standing on top of the edge it feels like it's going down. Everything stays in my mind feeling in a daze on the ground. Feels like it's gonna give life's to hard to live anymore. I think I've had enough things too tough. I'm out the door
english.segment2: All in all it's just another day now. You're falling down. What you gonna do. Standing on top of the world tonight. No ones looking back at you
english.segment3: Stand tall. It's going on. It's going on. It's gonna be just fine. You're holding on. Holding on today
english.segment4: Things don't stop and the others announced they're moving on. Salt & tears in the minds in the mouths of a bad decision. Too late for another mistake it's bringing me down. With all your faults it isn't your fault. What's going on
english.segment5: All in all it's just another day now. You're falling down. What you gonna do. Standing on top of the world tonight. No ones looking back at you
english.segment6: Stand tall. It's going on. It's going on. It's gonna be just fine. You're holding on. Holding on today
english.segment7: So you lost yourself. So you lost your way. Found life through someone else. But you threw it all away
english.segment8: All in all it's just another day now. You're falling down. What you gonna do. Standing on top of the world tonight. No ones looking back at you
english.segment9: Stand tall. It's going on. It's going on. It's gonna be just fine. You're holding on. Holding on today
english.segment10: Times rolling on. Rolling on today. It's going on. Going on today
